Thulsa isn't taking chances. Mysterium operatives spotted his elite troops, the Brogar Legion.

Let's take a more direct approach. I want you to take them out, specifically the {@LinkCreature:27#13#Thulsan guardians}, {@LinkCreature:27#14#Thulsan conjurers}, and {@LinkCreature:27#15#Thulsan followers}. If we can drive them out, we can retake the fortress.

We're impressed with your skills. You're a genuine asset to this fight.

The question is, why did Thulsa bring out his most feared legion? Was this fortress so important to his plan? So many questions yet to answer. All in due time.

That is all, .
